page.title: 06 WESTON FAVELL CENTRE
page.content: On the N.E.side of Northampton lies the largest supermarket in Europe, Tesco Weston Favell. The car park alone holds 1500 cars. In the lower shopping area there is a hairdresser,betting shop, stationery shop,insurance broker, two banks, toilets, escalators and lifts. The upper shopping area contains Tesco supermarket, public house,coffee shop, library,T.V.Rental,video centre,shoe repairer,travel agent,butchers,chemist shop,jewellers,ladies and gents outfitters,and a building society to name just a few of the facilities available under one roof. Tesco's supermarket provides a wide range of household goods including food,wine,d.i.y. and garden equipment. There is also a restaurant and Consumer advice centre.
